Class RailPoweredProperties

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class RailPoweredProperties
extends RailProperties
    Rail powered properties helper
    Applies to:
      Activator Rail
      Detector Rail
      Powered Rail
    Author:
    Jason Jones (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Detail

      • applyPowered

        public static Block applyPowered(Block block,
                                 boolean value)
        Applies whether the Rail is powered or not
        Parameters:
        block - the Block to be modified
        value - the boolean value to apply
        Returns:
        the Block with adjusted state (NOTE: Original Block object is also modified, using the return is unnecessary)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Should block or value be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Should an invalid property be applied
